Text: What a load of bullshit !! A religion that has as its main prophet a child molester and praises this Jesus who betrayed his people who were oppressed by the Romans (Give Caesar what is Caesar's [tribute money]), who lashed at safe targets like pharisees and others but took good care not to antagonize Romans, a cheap miracle-worker who chased devils out of pigs and in doing so had all the pigs killed, the owner said: oh, geez, Jeez, thanks for nothing..., what a load of religious crap...
Hey, don't get carried away... Mohammed most definitely existed and Jesus probably also, it's THE IMAGINARY GODS they believed in that don't exist...
